languages.text: {n}Глаза ксеноса начинают гипнотически мерцать. В его голосе возникает легкий, отдающий странным нездоровьем интерес. Он указывает на ваши раны.{/n} "Ты кровоточишь, как вспоротая туша. Тебе больно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза ксеноса начинают гипнотически мерцать. В его голосе возникает легкий, отдающий странным нездоровьем интерес. Он указывает на ваши раны.{/n} "Ты кровоточишь, как вспоротая туша. Тебе больно?"

languages.text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза ксеноса начинают гипнотически мерцать. В его голосе возникает легкий, отдающий странным нездоровьем интерес. Он указывает на ваши раны.{/n} "Ты кровоточишь, как вспоротая туша. Тебе больно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a slight, strangely unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a sliced-open carcass. Does it hurt?"

{n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a slight, strangely unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a sliced-open carcass. Does it hurt?"
{n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"
{n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"
{n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

languages.text: {n}异形的双眼仿佛催眠般地闪烁着。他指着你的伤口，你察觉到他的语气中带着某种微妙而邪恶的好奇。{/n}“你在流血，就像遭到劈砍的尸体一样。你很痛苦吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}异形的双眼仿佛催眠般地闪烁着。他指着你的伤口，你察觉到他的语气中带着某种微妙而邪恶的好奇。{/n}“你在流血，就像遭到劈砍的尸体一样。你很痛苦吧？”

languages.text: {n}Los ojos del xenos parpadean hipnóticamente. Sientes una curiosidad sutil y malsana en su tono cuando señala tus heridas:{/n} «Estás sangrando como un cadáver en el matadero. ¿Te duele?».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos del xenos parpadean hipnóticamente. Sientes una curiosidad sutil y malsana en su tono cuando señala tus heridas:{/n} «Estás sangrando como un cadáver en el matadero. ¿Te duele?».

languages.text: {n}異種族の目が一定のリズムでまばたきしはじめた。こちらの傷を指差す彼の口調に、なんともいえない変態的な好奇心を感じる。{/n}「屠られたばかりの死体のように血を流しているではないか。痛むのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の目が一定のリズムでまばたきしはじめた。こちらの傷を指差す彼の口調に、なんともいえない変態的な好奇心を感じる。{/n}「屠られたばかりの死体のように血を流しているではないか。痛むのか？」

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Xenos beginnen hypnotisch zu flackern. Du spürst eine unterschwellige, ungesunde Neugier in seinem Ton, als er auf deine Wunden deutet:{/n} "Ihr blutet wie ein geschlachteter Kadaver. Habt Ihr Schmerzen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Xenos beginnen hypnotisch zu flackern. Du spürst eine unterschwellige, ungesunde Neugier in seinem Ton, als er auf deine Wunden deutet:{/n} "Ihr blutet wie ein geschlachteter Kadaver. Habt Ihr Schmerzen?"

languages.text: {n}Les yeux du xénos s'illuminent de façon hypnotique et vous percevez une légère curiosité malsaine dans sa voix.{/n} « Vous vous videz de votre sang comme une carcasse à la boucherie, {n}dit-il en pointant vos blessures du doigt.{/n} Vous souffrez ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux du xénos s'illuminent de façon hypnotique et vous percevez une légère curiosité malsaine dans sa voix.{/n} « Vous vous videz de votre sang comme une carcasse à la boucherie, {n}dit-il en pointant vos blessures du doigt.{/n} Vous souffrez ? »

languages.text: {n}Zenonun gözleri kıpraşıyor. Yaralarını işaret edip sözlerini sarf ederken ses tonunda hafif bir merak yankılanıyor.{/n} "Doğranmış karkas gibi kana bulanmışsın. Ağrın sızın var mı?"
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos's eyes start flickering hypnotically. You sense a subtle, unhealthy curiosity in his tone as he points at your wounds:{/n} "You are bleeding like a butchered carcass. Are you in pain?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun gözleri kıpraşıyor. Yaralarına işaret edip sözlerini sarf ederken ses tonunda hafif bir merak yankılanıyor.{/n} "Doğranmış karkas gibi kana bulanmışsın. Ağrın sızın var mı?"
